database.name: VIEW RV_CASH_DETAIL
database.view: SELECT cl.C_Cash_ID, cl.C_CashLine_ID, c.AD_Client_ID, c.AD_Org_ID, cl.IsActive, cl.Created, cl.CreatedBy, cl.Updated, cl.UpdatedBy, c.C_CashBook_ID, c.Name, c.StatementDate, c.DateAcct, c.Processed, c.Posted, cl.Line, cl.Description, cl.CashType, cl.C_Currency_ID, cl.Amount, C_Currency_Convert(cl.Amount,cl.C_Currency_ID,cb.C_Currency_ID,c.StatementDate,null, c.AD_Client_ID, c.AD_Org_ID) AS ConvertedAmt, cl.C_Debt_Payment_ID, cl.C_Charge_ID FROM C_Cash c, C_CashLine cl, C_CashBook cb WHERE c.C_Cash_ID=cl.C_Cash_ID AND c.C_CashBook_ID=cb.C_CashBook_ID
